features.name: Mimicry
features.description: You can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitation with a successful DC 13 Wisdom (Insight) check.

features.name: Stay Down
features.description: When you hit a prone target with an attack, that target is incapacitated until the end of its next turn.

features.name: Claws
features.description: Melee: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., two attacks. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

features.name: Grapple
features.description: Melee: DC 14 vs STR, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: the target is grabbed.

features.name: Wing Sweep
features.description: Save: DC 14 vs STR, reach 5 ft., all targets. Hit: The target is knocked prone.

features.name: Poison Spur
features.description: Melee: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d10 + 3) poison damage, and the target is feeble and silenced (save ends both, DC 13 CON).

features.name: Toxic Retch
features.description: Save: DC 16 vs DEX, a 20 ft. line that is 10 ft wide extending from yourself, all targets. Hit: 0 (5d6 + 2) poison damage. Miss: half damage.
